message: Toue raises his right hand. The two Clears behind him step forward.

name: 東江
message: "These two are from the R-2E SP series. Think of them as your little brothers. Naturally, they're more advanced than a regular R-2E unit like yourself."

name: 東江
message: "To your right is Alpha and to your left is Alpha-2."

name: 東江
message: "Now, why don't we have a touching family reunion?"
The one named Alpha walks up to Clear with an arrogant smile on his face.

name: クリアα
message: "Ugh. Honestly, I really don't feel like dealing with you, but orders are orders."

name: クリアα
message: "I mean, it's not like you could even fight us if you wanted."

name: クリアα
message: "You already broke your hard lock, so your auto-repair systems have shut down. Breaking down doesn't feel very good, does it? Dear decrepit brother."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Breaking down...?"

name: 東江
message: "They have a hard lock installed which prevents them from rebelling against their master or their own kind."

name: 東江
message: "Under normal circumstances, it should be impossible to defy the programming, but Clear appears to be special."

name: 東江
message: "If a unit does violate its programming, the auto-repair function shuts off, and the unit begins to break down."

name: 東江
message: "In essence, the body decays with no way to repair the damage. The unit must return to us for that."
That must be why Clear's been in so much pain...
As if to illustrate Toue's explanation, flakes of skin fall from Clear's arm.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear!"

name: 東江
message: "Clear's 'younger brothers' also have that hard lock in place, but I have deactivated it for the moment so that they can punish their comrade for his mutiny."

name: クリアα
message: "Here I come, dear brother!"
Alpha leaps at Clear, unleashing a flurry of punches and kicks.
Clear defends, but Alpha's speed is overwhelming. Many strikes make it past Clear's guard.
With that hard lock still in place, Clear can't even fight back!

name: クリアα
message: "You won't last long if you keep taking hits! Are you trying to bore me?"
Alpha lands a kick in Clear's side, sending broken pieces of Clear's body flying.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Clear!"
I start toward him.

name: クリア
message: "Please stay back!"
His voice freezes me in place.

name: クリア
message: "Please stay back, Aoba. Please..."

name: クリアα
message: "You're so weak. I hoped for better entertainment. How disappointing."

name: クリア
message: "Ugh... Gah!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Clear!"

name: クリアα
message: "It's hard, isn't it? You don't even have the option to fight back. What better proof could you ask for that we're machines?"

name: クリアα
message: "We aren't human."
